game_description: This is a multiplayer VR Shooter platform with unique vertical gameplay! Take your friends and fight for the title of being called the toughest on the block. That flying locomotion system gives a fresh experience of 100% motion freedom during the game. The game features the movement technique unique for VR that allows players freely move around game level in all directions. Using hands swing locomotion drastically reduces motion sickness symptoms. Game supports up to 12 players per server with different game mode and configurations. Game is crossplatform and currently works on main VR platforms. Become part of growing wadality e-league community <3
review_1: This game is a shooter and gorilla tag at the same time if you were a beta tester you would get so many skins and that’s why it’s a good game it has reasonable price for the skins.
review_2: I really love you game I’ve been playing for only a couple days but have been playing for a while every day and I think it would be a very cool idea if you added a shotgun type of weapon or shield that if you mixed with the space black whole gun it could make it a bigger shield overall I would really love to work with you guys as sorta just a source of ideas or a intern if you want to call it that
review_3: Wadality is one of the best applab games that I have ever played, and for good reason. The game is simple to understand, has lots of fun features, and is perfect for playing with friends. My only problem is that the online play can be a little dodgy occasionally, but other than that, great game.
review_4: Amazing game gorilla tag mixed with a shooter which I’ve been waiting for a long time for that I from this game, so great game five stars love it
review_5: This game has to be one of the best games I have ever played. It’s a mix of gorilla tag, echo vr, and a shooter game! 50/10
